name: react-select-fast-filter-options
description: react-select filterOptions function optimized to quickly filter large options lists

scripts.build: npm run build:commonjs && npm run build:es && npm run build:demo && npm run build:umd
scripts.build:commonjs: npm run clean:commonjs && cross-env NODE_ENV=production cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs babel source --out-dir dist/commonjs --ignore *.example.js,*.test.js,source/demo/,source/tests.js
scripts.build:demo: npm run clean:demo && cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --config webpack.config.demo.js -p --bail
scripts.build:es: npm run clean:es && cross-env NODE_ENV=production cross-env BABEL_ENV=es babel source --out-dir dist/es --ignore *.example.js,*.test.js,source/demo/,source/tests.js
scripts.build:umd: npm run clean:umd && cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --config webpack.config.umd.js --bail
scripts.clean: npm run clean:commonjs && npm run clean:demo && npm run clean:es && npm run clean:umd

author: Brian Vaughn (brian.david.vaughn@gmail.com)
